p: The 50% effective concentrations (EC50s) and 50% cytotoxic concentrations (CC50s), and selective indices (SIs) in the in vitro study were calculated by non-linear regression using GraphPad Prism 6.0. Data were presented as mean ±SD for each point. Differences of averages between control and tests samples in the animal experiments were analyzed using Student’s t test. p-Values less than 0.05 were considered statistically significant.
